message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling this valuable product to you. I believe it's a great fit for your needs and I'm willing to make a competitive offer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1,100,000. This is a one-time offer, so I encourage you to take advantage of it.

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate the opportunity to work with you, but $1,100,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this time.  I'm willing to pay $1,050,000 for the product.  This reflects its value to me and allows for some room for us both to benefit from the deal.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1,075,000. This is a fair price considering the value the product brings to you and the effort I put into acquiring it.
